name: v1
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tweetfeed.
Tool description: Free feed with IOCs -  malicious URLs, domains, IPs, and hashes. [Website: https://tweetfeed.live]
API description: Retrieves filtered observations from the Version 1 endpoint based on specified time and filters.

time.description:
Select 1 of these timeframes:

**today** - Today starting 00:00 UTC)
**week** - Last 7 days
**month** - Last 30 days
**year** - Last 365 days

filter1.description:
Can be an specific user, type or tag:

Type → **url** / **domain** / **ip** / **sha256** / **md5**
Tag → **phishing** / **ransomware** / **CobaltStrike** ...
User → **@malwrhunterteam** / **@1ZRR4H** / **@MBThreatIntel** / ... (don't forget the @)

filter2.description:
Can be an specific user, type or tag:

Type → **url** / **domain** / **ip** / **sha256** / **md5**
Tag → **phishing** / **ransomware** / **CobaltStrike** ...
User → **@malwrhunterteam** / **@1ZRR4H** / **@MBThreatIntel** / ... (don't forget the @)
